column1: Freeman is a Tolkien fan, and during a visit to Anime Conventions in [[New Zealand]], he visited [[Mount Sunday]].

column2: I mean what is Legolas but [[wikipedia:Bishounen
column3: bishounen]] love? It gives the idea that, 'Hey! You can still be a man and dress well.' What a concept! The metrosexual or whatever they want to call it. It comes down to the fact that men can look good too.
column4: Crispin Freeman, who also filled [[Orlando Bloom]]'s seat in "Pirates of the Caribbean" games.}}

column2: I actually got to work on one of the Lord of the Rings videogames, The War of The Ring, and I got to play Faramir, which was great, you know, I got to sit there yelling 'For Gondor!', 'Ithilien!', you know, and you've just gotta love that stuff, it's awesome.
